mapper.select: SELECT RS.MEMBER_ID, BR.BOARD_NO, BR.POSITION, BR.EXPR_PERIOD, BR.EMPL_TYPE, BR.EMPL_CNDT, BR.ENTR_EXAM, BR.JOB_TYPE, BR.BENEFIT, CP.CMPN_NO, CP.MEMBER_ID AS CMPN_ID, CP.CMPN_NM, CP.CMPN_ADDR, CMPN_LOGO, CMPN_INTRO, CMPN_MCOUNT FROM BOARD_RECRUIT BR JOIN RESUME RS ON RS."POSITION" = BR."POSITION" JOIN COMPANY CP ON BR.CMPN_NO = CP.CMPN_NO WHERE ( (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD) OR (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE) OR (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question5} = CP.CMPN_ADDR) OR (#{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD AND #{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE) OR (#{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD AND #{question5} = CP.CMPN_ADDR) OR (#{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE AND #{question5}= CP.CMPN_ADDR) ) AND RS.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT BOARD_NO, CMPN_NO, CMPN_LOGO, CMPN_NM, POSITION FROM BOARD_RECRUIT JOIN COMPANY USING (CMPN_NO)

SELECT BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, EMPL_CNDT, ENTR_EXAM, BENEFIT, POSITION, JOB_TYPE, CMPN_ADDR, CMPN_NO, CMPN_INTRO, CMPN_NM, CMPN_LOGO FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_RECRUIT USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN COMPANY USING (CMPN_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
